message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this offer represents a great value.
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price for this product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not sure if $13,000 is the best deal for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11,500. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
